entry.title: Re
entry.summary: Re Twitter Dev: Now testing: NFT Tweet Tiles 🚀 Some links to NFTs on @rarible, @MagicEden, @dapperlabs and @Jumptradenft will now show you a larger picture of the NFT alongside details like the title and creator. One more step in our journey to let developers impact the Tweet experience.

entry.title: Twitter will allow users to buy and sell NFTs through tweets.
